Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class ExpertGame

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Game
it.polimi.ingsw.model.ExpertGame
public class ExpertGame extends Game
This is a subclass of game contains the information and the actions that can be performed in the expert game mode Each player can play 3 Personality card Each player can earn money to purchase Personality card

    • instantiateGameElements

      public void instantiateGameElements(ArrayList<String> playersNames)
      This method instantiates all the game elements: clouds,teachers,basket,islands, boards and personality cards.
      Overrides:
      instantiateGameElements in class Game

    • moveStudentsFromLobbyToTable

      protected void moveStudentsFromLobbyToTable(Player player, Color studentToMove)
      Moves the selected student tile from the player's lobby to the color's table. If the tile is placed in position 3,6 or 9 and there are coins left the player is given a coin.
      Overrides:
      moveStudentsFromLobbyToTable in class Game
      Parameters:
      player - : the player making the move.
      studentToMove - : the chosen student who is being moved.

    • updateTeachersOwnershipForCard2

      public void updateTeachersOwnershipForCard2(String nickname)
      This Method recalculates the given player's number of students and possibly assigns him 1+ teachers ownership It's different from the updateTeachersOwnership method because the player takes control of the professors even if they have the same number of students in the Table as the current owner
      Parameters:
      nickname - : reference of the player of whom we want to check teachers' ownership

    • moveMotherNatureForCard4

      public boolean moveMotherNatureForCard4(String nickname, int numSteps)
      Method moveMotherNature checks if the player with Player ID can move Mother Nature of numSteps and if it's doable, moves Mother Nature from the current island to the new one It's different from the MoveMotherNature method because MotherNature can do 2 additional moves
      Parameters:
      nickname - : name given to the player, TO DO
      numSteps - : number of islands that the player identified with the playerId wants to move mother nature

    • isMoveMNLegalForCard4

      public boolean isMoveMNLegalForCard4(String nickname, int numSteps)
      Method isMoveMNLegalForCard4 checks if the player identified by nickname can move Mother Nature of numSteps.
      Parameters:
      nickname - : name given to the player.
      numSteps - : number of islands that the player identified with the playerId wants to move mother nature
      Returns:
      true if the move is legal, false otherwise.

      Parameters:
      island - : instance of the island on which I want to calculate influence

    • calculateStudentsInfluences

      protected HashMap<String,Integer> calculateStudentsInfluences(Island island, ArrayList<Player> players, Color bannedColor)
      Method that calculates the influence of each player on an island but doesn't consider the bannedColor students
      Parameters:
      island - : instance of the island on which I want to calculate influence
      players - : list of all the players of the game
      bannedColor - : Color that I want to exclude from the influence count
      Returns:
      map that represents the influence of each players on that island.

      public void extractPersonalityCards()
      Method that randomly extract 3 Personality card This method differentiates the types of card drawn according to the ID

    • areCardRequirementsSatisfied

      private boolean areCardRequirementsSatisfied(int cardId)
      Method areCardRequirementsSatisfied verifies that preconditions for the activation of a Personality are satisfied.
      Parameters:
      cardId - Personality identification number.
      Returns:
      true if the requirements are satisfied, false otherwise.

    • resetActivePersonality

      public void resetActivePersonality()
      Method that reset the active Personality card

    • executeCard1Effect

      public boolean executeCard1Effect(int chosenStudent, int islandId)
      Method executeCard1Effect implements Personality 1's Effect, therefore it moves a student tile from the card to the chosen island.
      Parameters:
      chosenStudent - : the index of the chosen student tile placed the card.
      islandId - : the ID that identifies the destination island.
      Returns:
      true if the parameters are correct and the effect has been correctly applied, false otherwise.

    • executeCard5Effect

      public boolean executeCard5Effect(int islandId)
      Implements Personality 5's effect by adding a ban tile placeholder on the chosen island. The ban will prevent influence's computation and tower placements on the banned island.
      Parameters:
      islandId - : the banned island's unique ID.
      Returns:
      true if parameters are correct and the effect has been correctly applied, false otherwise.

    • executeCard7Effect

      public boolean executeCard7Effect(ArrayList<Integer> cardStudentsIndexes, ArrayList<Integer> lobbyStudentsIndexes)
      Method executeCard7Effect implements Personality 7's Effect, therefore it swaps up to 3 student tiles from the card with as many student tiles in the active player's lobby.
      Parameters:
      cardStudentsIndexes - : indexes of the student tiles on the card.
      lobbyStudentsIndexes - : indexed of the students tiles int the player's lobby.
      Returns:
      true if the parameters are correct and the effect has been correctly applied, false otherwise.

    • isMoveStudentFromCardLegal

      public boolean isMoveStudentFromCardLegal(LobbyPersonality personality, int cardStudentId)
      Checks if the selected student tile can be moved from the active personality card.
      Parameters:
      personality - : the active personality card.
      cardStudentId - : index of the personality's student whose move is checked.
      Returns:
      true if the move can be performed, false otherwise.

    • isMoveStudentFromLobbyLegal

      public boolean isMoveStudentFromLobbyLegal(int lobbyStudentId)
      Checks if the selected student tile can be moved from the current player's lobby.
      Parameters:
      lobbyStudentId - : index of the lobby's student whose move is checked.
      Returns:
      true if the move can be performed, false otherwise.

    • executeCard10Effect

      public boolean executeCard10Effect(ArrayList<Color> tableStudents, ArrayList<Integer> lobbyStudentsIndexes)
      Implements Personality 10's effect by swapping up to two students' tiles between the active player's lobby and table.
      Parameters:
      tableStudents - : color of the tiles being moved from the board's table.
      lobbyStudentsIndexes - : indexes of the tiles being moved from the board's lobby.
      Returns:
      true if the parameters are correct and the effect has been correctly applied, false otherwise.

    • executeCard11Effect

      public boolean executeCard11Effect(int cardStudentIndex)
      Implements Personality's 11 effect by moving the chosen student tile from the personality card to the active player's lobby.
      Parameters:
      cardStudentIndex - : index of the student being moved from the card.
      Returns:
      true if the move is legal and the effect has been correctly applied, false otherwise.

    • executeCard12Effect

      public boolean executeCard12Effect(Color chosenColor)
      Implements Personality 12's effect, therefore moves up to three student tiles of the chosen color from each player's table.
      Parameters:
      chosenColor - : the color of the tiles which are being removed from the players' tables.
      Returns:
      true if the effect has been correctly applied, false otherwise.

    • replaceCardStudent

      private void replaceCardStudent()
      Adds a student tile to the lobby personality's arraylist. In the case of an empty basket lastRound's flag is set to true.

    • getPersonalities

      public ArrayList<Personality> getPersonalities()
      Method that returns the list of all personality cards

      public Personality getActivePersonality()
      Method that returns the Personality card instance of the active card in the round

    • resetIslandBan

      public void resetIslandBan(Island island)
      Method resetIslandBan removes a ban tile from the selected island as a result of MotherNature's placement.
      Parameters:
      island - island from which a ban tile is being removed.

    • getCoins

      public int getCoins()
      Method that returns the number of coins in the game

    • setBannedColor

      public void setBannedColor(Color color)
      Sets the color that will not be considered in the influence's computation, as is expected by Personality 9's effect.
      Parameters:
      color - : the chosen color.

    • resetBannedColor

      public void resetBannedColor()
      Sets the color not considered in the influence's computation to null.

    • getBannedColor

      public Color getBannedColor()
      Method getBannedColor returns the color chosen by the player who actived card
      Returns:
      the color not considered in the influence's computation for this round.
